description: This file is the main entry point of a React Native app for a note-taking application. It sets up navigation, themes, and context providers, and defines the main component structure including bottom tabs and stack navigation.

methods.name: TabsNavigator
methods.description: Defines the bottom tab navigation for categories 'All', 'Work', and 'Personal' with custom icons.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main exported component that sets up theme, navigation container, status bar, and the primary stack navigator including tabs and note editor.
